item.title: Home
item.content:encoded:
Taking businesses to the Cloud, and beyond.

At WFH Integrations we help you understand cloud technology and help you take the first step in making your business future ready.

What we do

 

Helping Businesses be future ready

 

With cloud computing on the rise, we help business take the jump to cloud computing by integrating their business with a leading cloud service provider that best suits their needs.

Learn More

 

Enabling academic institutions take on new ways of learning

 

We also enable academic institutions to take on new ways of delivering lectures to students by integrating their institution with an online classroom platform to help them conduct interactive sessions with their students

Learn More

 

Providing support to organisations for online events

 

We help individuals and organisations organise online events of any scale and type. Right from planning to execution we provide complete IT support throughout their event.

Learn More

“I don’t need a hard disk in my computer if I can get to the server faster…Carrying around these non connected computers is byzantine by comparison”

— Steve Jobs

Request a Call back

Any questions about us or about our services? Don’t hesitate to contact us at any time via email or at +91 8779629724. You can also drop in your queries using the Enquiry form.

 
Name *
Thank you!

item.title: About Us
item.content:encoded:
About Us

We are a small team of highly motivated individuals, based out of Mumbai, India. Starting out small in May 2020, we have expanded our service line-up to more than 10 platforms while focusing on providing the best service. We specialise in shifting your business to the cloud and providing you a seamless experience as you take a step towards making your business, future ready.

Meet our Team!

item.title: Products
item.content:encoded:
Our Services

For Businesses

 

Work From Home

We enable you and your business to work from home, irrespective of your market sector. We setup remote access on your current office hardware and software to make it compatible for working from home. We help you monitor your employee’s work and monitor all work progress.

 
 

Shifting to the Cloud

We offer cloud integration services to help you move your business to the cloud. Depending upon your requirement, we suggest an appropriate cloud service and then setup it up from scratch or move your business from existing setup to the cloud.

IT Support

We provide round the clock IT support for your business cloud. We help you diagnose and solve any issue and technical glitch that you might face while using the cloud.

 
Enquire Now

Offered Cloud Platforms

 

Google Suites

Microsoft Azure

Microsoft 365

Amazon Web Services (AWS)

For Academic Institutions

 

Conduct your classes and lectures on a completely online platform. Send lecture notes, conduct exams and give out assignments all from one place. Track course progress and student progress from teacher’s dashboard.

We offer complete integration and setup of the following two platforms for academic institutions and academic classes. Choose from one of the two platforms and the rest is handled by us. From setting up classrooms to adding students, we help you take your educational institution completely online. From Enquiry to Starting classes, our turn around time is less than 5 days.

CANVAS

CANVAS by Instructure is a Learning System Management Platform that is highly customisable to suit your needs. We setup this platform for you on the basis on the specifications you require and hand over the control once the platform has been setup. We provide training sessions to help you and your colleagues make the most out of the platform. This platform is compatible with most video conferencing softwares out there so taking online classes is a breeze. Contact us for pricing and more information

Google Classroom

Google Classroom comes as a part of Google Suite for Education. We help you configure the platform and build all the necessary features that your institution requires to conduct its day to day work. Easy user interface and intuitive UX makes this platform one of the easiest to use. Once the platform is setup we also offer training sessions to help teachers and students make the most out the platform. Contact us for pricing and more information

Enquire Now

For Online Conferences and Events

 

Think it.

It all begins with an idea. Maybe you want to launch a business. Maybe you want to turn a hobby into something more. Or maybe you have a creative project to share with the world. Whatever it is, the way you tell your story online can make all the difference.

Plan it.

Once you know what you want to conduct, we help you plan it right from the ground up. We help you acquire an online conferencing platform, send out invites and manage registration lists. We setup the conferencing platform just for you so that you have all the features you need.

Conduct it.

Once we plan it, we provide complete technical support throughout the duration of the event.We help you execute your event without any technical glitches from your side and make conducting online events a breeze.

 
Enquire Now

item.title: Trainings
item.content:encoded:
Training Sessions

What you will learn

 

Gmail for Business

Learn how to use Gmail to its fullest capabilities with mail forwarding, selective mail filtering, Mail Automation, and 3rd party integrations into Gmail

Google Docs, Sheets and Slides

Learn to use the most popular collaborative working tools to create documents, spreadsheets and mind blowing presentations, handoff work between multiple devices and use Automation in Google Sheets for Data Analytics

Google Drive

Learn how to create, manage and upload files in Google Drive, how to sync devices with google drive, create automated backups to drive, Enable restricted access to files and learn how to use data loss prevention and Vault for Drive

 

Google Forms

Learn how to create forms for all purposes from surveys to feedback and event registrations. Learn how to use email validation and intelligent forms for authentic data. Learn how to analyse responses with automatic summaries

Google Sites

Learn how to create your own free website without knowing any programming or design skills. Learn how to secure your website and optimise your site for all devices and browsers

Google Meet and Chat

Learn how to schedule meetings, use administrator features in Google meet, invite people, conduct webinars and conferences on Meet. Learn how to use Google Chat for Team collaboration and businesses

 

Google Calendar

Learn how to use Google Calendar Integration features, how to schedule events and meetings from Calendars, how to sync all calendars and create common calendars for entire team or business

Google Admin

Learn how to use Google Admin to manage users in your organisation, create groups and teams, manage company resources and track activity of employees, setup security features for your account and more

Google My Business

Learn how to manage your business page on google, how to advertise with google advertising and use website analysis and web tracking for your business, update information about your services and products and more

Enquire Now

Choose between the two most popular platforms

 

Canvas offers a wide range of features depending upon your needs. Learn how to make courses, pre recorded lectures, live lectures, take quizzes and assignments with plagiarism checker. Learn how to make announcements, give grades, and assign specific roles to teachers and administrators.

Google Classroom comes as a part of Google Suites for Education. Learn how to make classrooms, post lecture materials, take online classes, give assignments, take quizzes, see student progress and how to integrate google classroom with third party applications

 
Enquire Now
